message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $120. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth much more to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $110. Let's meet in the middle on this one!
